meta_text: to Celebrate Total Victory over the Enemy's Forces," being an Extensive Version of the Unique Rite of Fulfilment in the Tradition of the Mighty One; King of All the Protectors of the Teachings of the Virtuous Ones, of All those Angels Who Battle with the Enemy; Lord Who Decides the Life or Death of Every Living Being  in All Three Realms; Great King Who is an Emanation of the Supreme Angel, and Who Protects Those Who Keep Their Vows, as if They Were His Own Sons or Daughters; the Diamond Angel of Power (Vajravega)_SKYABS RJE PHA BONG KHA PA BDE CHEN SNYING PO (1878-1941)
title_tib: DGE LDAN BSTAN SRUNG DGRA LHA'I RGYAL PO SRID GSUM SKYED GU'I SROG BDAG DAM LDAN BU BZHIN SKYONG BA'I LHA MCHOG SPRUL BA'I RGYAL CHEN RDO RJE SHUGS LDAN RTZAL GYI SGER SKANG RGYAS PA PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL PA'I RNGA DBYANGS
title_eng: 'The Drumbeatto Celebrate Total Victory over the Enemy's Forces," being an Extensive Version of the Unique Rite of Fulfilment in the Tradition of the Mighty One; King of All the Protectors of the Teachings of the Virtuous Ones, of All those Angels Who Battle with the Enemy; Lord Who Decides the Life or Death of Every Living Being  in All Three Realms; Great King Who is an Emanation of the Supreme Angel, and Who Protects Those Who Keep Their Vows, as if They Were His Own Sons or Daughters; the Diamond Angel of Power (Vajravega)
